artist: decorator: Christophe-Ferdinand Caron; manufacturer: Sèvres Porcelain Factory
description: Presented by Emperor Napoleon the First to Prince William of Prussia in 1808; painted with scenes from the Fables of La Fontaine.
inscription: on bottom: Le Rat et la Grenouille. Le Chien qui porte a / son cou le diner de / sone Maitre.
markings: stamped on bottom: M.Imp.1e / de Sevres / 7
object_name: Sugar bowl from a tea service for twelve
title: Sugar bowl from a tea service for twelve
